name: Just a chill guy
description: Chill Guy is the memecoin for the Chill Guy meme which is going viral on TikTok with over 600 million videos about it This project is about fostering a community around this viral meme and the message it shares. The Chill Guy meme is all about a nonchalant character who remains unfaded no matter what life throws at him. In a hectic industry as the crypto industry, we could all be a little more like Chill Guy.
